Module kivakit.collections
Package com.telenav.kivakit.collections.watcher

Class BaseCollectionChangeWatcher<T>

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.broadcasters.Multicaster
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.repeaters.BaseRepeater
com.telenav.kivakit.collections.watcher.BaseCollectionChangeWatcher<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
CollectionChangeWatcher<T>, Broadcaster, Listener, Repeater, Transceiver, Receiver, Transmitter, NamedObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
PeriodicCollectionChangeWatcher
public abstract class BaseCollectionChangeWatcher<T> extends BaseRepeater implements CollectionChangeWatcher<T>
A base implementation of CollectionChangeWatcher. Change listeners can be added and removed with addListener(CollectionChangeListener) and removeListener(CollectionChangeListener). A thread can then wait for a change with waitForChange(). Subclasses receive notification of changes with onAdded(Object), onModified(Object) and onRemoved(Object).
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
See Also:
CollectionChangeWatcher
